name: AWS Glue
short: A fully managed extract, transform, and load (ETL) service that makes it easy to prepare and load your data for analytics.
description: AWS Glue is a fully managed extract, transform, and load (ETL) service that makes it easy to prepare and load data for analytics. It discovers and catalogs metadata from various data sources in a centralized data catalog, and generates ETL code in Python or Scala. Glue can handle both batch and real-time ETL jobs, and is integrated with AWS services like S3, RDS, and Redshift. It simplifies data preparation, transformation, and loading, enabling robust data analysis solutions.
